content.html: Important: You cannot assume a linux user has a home directory, or username. Many docker containers use a bare UID with no user or home. Two different packages this week failing silently because, after 2 hours of struggling, it turns out they depend on a home dir.
content.value:
Important:

You cannot assume a linux user has a home directory, or username.

Many docker containers use a bare UID with no user or home.

Two different packages this week failing silently because, after 2 hours of struggling, it turns out they depend on a home dir.
